description: The Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering (MAE) at the Royal Military College of Canada (RMC) in Kingston, ON has a requirement for a high accuracy Digital Microscope System. The Digital Microscope System must be capable of metallography and grain measurements to improve efficiency, and research projects. The requirement is for the supply and delivery, of one new Digital Microscope System, including a multi stages microscope, camera, lenses, installation and operating instructions, trouble-shooting manuals, and technical support in accordance with the specifications detailed in Annex A. All deliverables MUST be received on or before 28 March 2024.

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: High Accuracy Digital Microscope System

#### Notice Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4350980165-Doc4385861495
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: January 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 25, 2024 2:00 PM EST
* **Status**: Closed

#### Procurement Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services, PSPC
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence, DND
* **Requirement**: High accuracy digital microscope system for the Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering department at the Royal Military College of Canada in Kingston, ON
* **Deliverables**: One new digital microscope system, including a multi-stage microscope, camera, lenses, installation and operating instructions, troubleshooting manuals, and technical support
* **Delivery Address**: Kingston, ON

#### Important Tender Information

* The closing date of January 25, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST has been updated. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by this date.
* The Royal Military College of Canada requires a high-accuracy digital microscope system to improve research projects and metallography and grain measurements efficiency.
* Mandatory technical criteria listed in Annex C must be met.

#### Bid Submission Requirements

* Bids must be submitted electronically using the Ariba Discovery portal.
* Supporting documentation and technical support will be required.

#### Due Date for Deliverables

* All deliverables must be received on or before March 28, 2024.

#### Points of Contact

* **Name**: Nathalie Longtin, Department of Public Works and Government Services, PSPC
* **Email**: [nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.longtin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)   

#### Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

Please visit the Ariba Discovery portal for the full notice, attachments, and specifications. Note that this tender is closed, and all bids must be submitted by January 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EST.
